50#ifndef AM_HAL_MRAM_H
51#define AM_HAL_MRAM_H
52
53#ifdef __cplusplus
54extern "C"
55{
56#endif
57
58#include <stdint.h>
59#include <stdbool.h>
60
61//*****************************************************************************
62//
65//
66//*****************************************************************************
67#define AM_HAL_MRAM_PROGRAM_KEY 0x12344321
68#define AM_HAL_MRAM_INFO_KEY 0xD894E09E
69
70//
71// Region defines for valid_address_range() checks
72//
73#define AM_HAL_MRAM_MRAM_REGION 0x01
74#define AM_HAL_MRAM_ITCM_REGION 0x02
75#define AM_HAL_MRAM_DTCM_REGION 0x04
76#define AM_HAL_MRAM_SSRAM_REGION 0x08 // Only SSRAM
77#define AM_HAL_MRAM_SRAM_REGION 0x10 // All of SRAM (allows spanning if no hole between DTCM/TCM & SSRAM)
78
79
81
82//*****************************************************************************
83//
86//
87//*****************************************************************************
88#define AM_HAL_MRAM_SRAM_ADDR SSRAM_BASEADDR
89#define AM_HAL_MRAM_SRAM_SIZE SSRAM_MAX_SIZE
90#define AM_HAL_MRAM_SRAM_LARGEST_VALID_ADDR (AM_HAL_MRAM_SRAM_ADDR + AM_HAL_MRAM_SRAM_SIZE - 1)
91#define AM_HAL_MRAM_DTCM_START DTCM_BASEADDR
92#define AM_HAL_MRAM_DTCM_SIZE DTCM_MAX_SIZE
93#define AM_HAL_MRAM_DTCM_END (AM_HAL_MRAM_SRAM_ADDR + AM_HAL_MRAM_DTCM_SIZE - 1)
95
96//*****************************************************************************
97//
100//
101//*****************************************************************************
102#define AM_HAL_MRAM_ADDR MRAM_BASEADDR
103#define AM_HAL_MRAM_INSTANCE_SIZE ( 2 * 1024 * 1024 )
104#define AM_HAL_MRAM_NUM_INSTANCES 2
105#define AM_HAL_MRAM_TOTAL_SIZE ( AM_HAL_MRAM_INSTANCE_SIZE * AM_HAL_MRAM_NUM_INSTANCES )
106#define AM_HAL_MRAM_LARGEST_VALID_ADDR ( AM_HAL_MRAM_ADDR + AM_HAL_MRAM_TOTAL_SIZE - 1 )
108
109#define AM_HAL_INFO0_SIZE_BYTES (2 * 1024)
110#define AM_HAL_INFO1_SIZE_BYTES (6 * 1024)
111#define AM_HAL_INFO1_VISIBLE_OFFSET (0x1200)
112
113//
114// Module specific start for MRAM HAL RC's. Adding aother 0x100 offset so as to
115// remove any conflicts in case it's used in conjunction with other modules.
116//
117#define AM_HAL_MRAM_SUCCESS 0x0
118#define AM_HAL_MRAM_ERROR (AM_HAL_STATUS_MODULE_SPECIFIC_START + 0x100)
119
120#define AM_HAL_MRAM_INVLD_KEY ( AM_HAL_MRAM_ERROR + 0x01 ) // 1 Invalid key
121#define AM_HAL_MRAM_INVLD_START_MRAM_ADDR ( AM_HAL_MRAM_ERROR + 0x02 ) // 2 pui32Dst is invalid
122#define AM_HAL_MRAM_INVLD_END_MRAM_ADDR ( AM_HAL_MRAM_ERROR + 0x03 ) // 3 NRAM addressing range would be exceeded
123#define AM_HAL_MRAM_INVLD_SRC_START_ADDR ( AM_HAL_MRAM_ERROR + 0x04 ) // 4 pui32Src invalid start address
124#define AM_HAL_MRAM_INVLD_SRC_END_ADDR ( AM_HAL_MRAM_ERROR + 0x05 ) // 5 pui32Src invalid end address
125#define AM_HAL_MRAM_HW_FAIL ( AM_HAL_MRAM_ERROR + 0x06 ) // 6 Hardware error
126#define AM_HAL_MRAM_INTERNAL7 ( AM_HAL_MRAM_ERROR + 0x07 ) // 7 Internal error
127#define AM_HAL_MRAM_INTERNAL8 ( AM_HAL_MRAM_ERROR + 0x08 ) // 8 Internal error
128#define AM_HAL_MRAM_INTERNAL9 ( AM_HAL_MRAM_ERROR + 0x09 ) // 9 Internal error
129#define AM_HAL_MRAM_PWR_OFF ( AM_HAL_MRAM_ERROR + 0x0A ) // 10 Memory not powered
130#define AM_HAL_MRAM_WRITE_PROT ( AM_HAL_MRAM_ERROR + 0x0B ) // 11 NVRAM is write protected
131#define AM_HAL_MRAM_READ_PROT ( AM_HAL_MRAM_ERROR + 0x0C ) // 12 NVRAM is read protected
132#define AM_HAL_MRAM_INTERNALD ( AM_HAL_MRAM_ERROR + 0x0D ) // 13 Internal error
133#define AM_HAL_MRAM_INVLD_ADDR_ALIGNMENT ( AM_HAL_MRAM_ERROR + 0x40 ) // 64 pui32Dst not properly aligned for requested operation
134
135
